howToPlayInstructionsTitle: Welcome to the game! Here's how to play:
howToPlayInstructions1: 1. Start the game by pressing the 'Start' button.
howToPlayInstructions2: 2. The goal is to collect as many points as possible.
howToPlayInstructions3: 3. Avoid obstacles and time your moves carefully.
howToPlayInstructions4: 4. Use the arrow keys or swipe gestures to control your character.
